00010 EagleDbInformationSchema* EagleDbInformationSchema_New(EagleDbInstance *db, char *columnName)
00011 {
00012     EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema = (EagleDbInformationSchema*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbInformationSchema_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbInformationSchema));
00013     if(NULL == infoSchema) {
00014         return NULL;
00015     }
00016     
00017     infoSchema->db = db;
00018     infoSchema->columnName = (NULL == columnName ? NULL : strdup(columnName));
00019     
00020     return infoSchema;
00021 }

00023 void EagleDbInformationSchema_Init(EagleDbInstance *db, EagleDbSchema *schema)
00024 {
00025     int i;
00026     EagleDbInformationSchema *obj;
00027     EagleDbTableData *td;
00028     EagleDbTable *table;
00029     
00030     /* table definition */
00031     table = EagleDbTable_New("information_schema_tables");
00032     EagleDbTable_addColumn(table, EagleDbColumn_New("table_schema", EagleDataTypeVarchar));
00033     EagleDbTable_addColumn(table, EagleDbColumn_New("table_name", EagleDataTypeVarchar));
00034     
00035     /* replace the stream providers with virtual providers */
00036     td = EagleDbTableData_New(table, db->pageSize);
00037     for(i = 0; i < td->usedProviders; ++i) {
00038         EaglePageProvider *temp = td->providers[i];
00039         
00040         /* information schema object */
00041         obj = EagleDbInformationSchema_New(db, temp->name);
00042         
00043         td->providers[i] = (EaglePageProvider*) EaglePageProviderVirtual_New(
00044             db->pageSize,
00045             temp->name,
00046             temp->type,
00047             (void*) obj,
00048             (void (*)(void*)) EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_free,
00049             NULL,
00050             (int (*)(void*)) EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_pagesRemaining,
00051             (EaglePage* (*)(void*)) EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_nextPage,
00052             (void (*)(void*)) EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_reset,
00053             NULL
00054         );
00055         
00056         EaglePageProvider_Delete(temp);
00057     }
00058     
00059     EagleDbSchema_addTable(schema, td);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_free(EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema)
00063 {
00064     EagleDbInformationSchema_Delete(infoSchema);
00065 }
00066 
00067 int EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_pagesRemaining(EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema)
00068 {
00069     EagleDbSchema *schema = EagleDbInstance_getSchema(infoSchema->db, EagleDbSchema_DefaultSchemaName);
00070     int totalTables = EagleLinkedList_length(schema->tables);
00071     return EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(totalTables - infoSchema->recordOffset, infoSchema->db->pageSize);
00072 }
00073 
00074 EaglePage* EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_nextPage(EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema)
00075 {
00076     EaglePage *page;
00077     char **data;
00078     int totalTables = 0, tableCount = 0;
00079     
00080     /* count all tables */
00081     EagleLinkedList_Foreach(infoSchema->db->schemas, EagleDbSchema*, schema)
00082     {
00083         totalTables += EagleLinkedList_length(schema->tables);
00084     }
00085     EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00086     
00087     data = (char**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_nextPage.1", (size_t) totalTables, sizeof(char*));
00088     if(NULL == data) {
00089         return NULL;
00090     }
00091     
00092     EagleLinkedList_Foreach(infoSchema->db->schemas, EagleDbSchema*, schema)
00093     {
00094         EagleLinkedList_Foreach(schema->tables, EagleDbTableData*, td)
00095         {
00096             if(0 == strcmp("table_schema", infoSchema->columnName)) {
00097                 data[tableCount] = strdup(schema->name);
00098             }
00099             else if(0 == strcmp("table_name", infoSchema->columnName)) {
00100                 data[tableCount] = strdup(td->table->name);
00101             }
00102         
00103             ++tableCount;
00104         }
00105         EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00106     }
00107     EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00108     
00109     page = EaglePage_New(EagleDataTypeVarchar, data, totalTables, totalTables, 0, EagleTrue);
00110     
00111     infoSchema->recordOffset += totalTables;
00112     return page;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void EagleDbInformationSchema_tables_reset(EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema)
00116 {
00117     infoSchema->recordOffset = 0;
00118 }

00120 void EagleDbInformationSchema_Delete(EagleDbInformationSchema *infoSchema)
00121 {
00122     if(NULL == infoSchema) {
00123         return;
00124     }
00125     
00126     EagleMemory_Free(infoSchema->columnName);
00127     EagleMemory_Free(infoSchema);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void EagleDbInformationSchema_Cleanup(EagleDbInstance *db)
00131 {
00132     EagleDbSchema *s = EagleDbInstance_getSchema(db, EagleDbSchema_DefaultSchemaName);
00133     EagleDbTableData *td = EagleDbSchema_getTable(s, "information_schema_tables");
00134     EagleLinkedList_deleteObject(s->tables, td);
00135     
00136     EagleDbTable_DeleteWithColumns(td->table);
00137     EagleDbTableData_Delete(td);
00138 }
